front.title: Respondent summary report business survey :COVID-19 impacts and recovery in the context of complex events

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.)

front.abstract: The goal of this report is to provide small- and medium-sized enterprise (SME) stakeholders (e.g., owners and managers) who took part in the NIST Business Survey: COVID-19 Impact and Recovery survey1 between July 8 and August 8, 2020 with a summary of self-reported data. This survey was the initial phase of a longitudinal research effort on SME Complex Event Resilience (CER) undertaken by the Applied Economics Office (AEO) at the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) and the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA).
